participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Confident and nostalgic, enjoys sharing personal interests related to music and vintage cars.
participant_1.background: I like listening to music that helps me feel more confident and comfortable in my own skin. I am twenty six years old this may. I'm looking for a place with a big yard for my dog and a garage for my car. I want a home that is quiet and private, with plenty of space for my vintage cars. I am from Tennessee.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, with a passion for movies and a quirky collection of toys.
participant_2.background: My collection of movie tickets reminds me of my favorite films. I am on a low carb diet. I'm a Disney fan who collects little raincoat-wearing toys. My favorite music artist is Isaiah Rashad. My family accepts me as I am, even with my red hair and my history of working for Monsanto.

content.text: Hi! What's up?
Not much, just watching TV. I love watching movies, what about you?
Movies are great, I love going to the theater. I've been to Disney a few times too.
Disney is amazing! I have a huge collection of Disney movies and raincoat-wearing toys.
I love Disney toys! Raincoat-wearing toys?
Yeah, they're my favorite. They're so cute! Do you have any favorite music artists?
I like a lot of music, but my favorite artist is Isaiah Rashad.
I've never heard of him. What kind of music does he make?
He's a rapper. He's really good, you should check him out.
I will, thanks for the recommendation! What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer. What about you?
I work for Monsanto.
Monsanto? What do you do there?
I'm a scientist. I research and develop new crop strains.
That sounds really interesting! I've never met anyone who works for Monsanto before.
It's a great company to work for. They're really innovative.
That's good to hear. Are you from Tennessee? I'm from there.
No, I'm from California. I moved to Tennessee a few years ago.
How do you like it here?
I love it! It's so beautiful and there's so much to do.
I'm glad you like it here
